attributes.action: Ban Sharia in Scotland and the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At least 85 Islamic sharia courts are operating in Britain

The astonishing figure is 17 times higher than previously accepted.

They lay down judgments which can be given full legal status if approved in national law courts.

We the undersigned clearly state that you cannot have two legal systems operating in this country and Sharia must be banned and made illegal.

rejection.details: Sharia has no jurisdiction in England and Wales, and there is no intention for this to change. Scotland is a devolved matter and you should contact the Scottish Executive directly.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
